body.name: Portable Fan Rechargeable, Cordless Battery Powered Fan with LED Lantern, Small Table Fan, USB Battery Operated Fans for Travel Bedroom Home Camping Tent Office Beach Desk Picnic Barbecue Fishing
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Strong Wind & Quiet Design for Battery Powered Fans: This portable fan comes with 4 adjustable wind speeds to meet different needs and keep you cool at home or for travel like camping. The brushless motor and upgraded fan blades operate efficiently with minimum noise, and you will have a calm and peaceful experience thanks to its noise level of ≤ 30Db.

Super Durable Rechargeable Battery: This portable fan rechargeable with an internal high-capacity battery takes only 3-5 hours to be full charged by using the Type-C cable, work time from 10 to 30 hours in different modes, ensuring a cool sleep at night. With the USB-A port, this battery operated fan can be used as an emergency power source for the GPS or phone charging, allowing you to avoid the anxiety of power drawn of the phone during outdoor trips.

High bright Light Camping Lantern: The portable battery operated fan for travel features 3 levels of bright LED lights, provides a soft and non-glaring light. The lowest brightness is suitable for reading at night to protect your eyesight, and the highest brightness can illuminate the entire tent to enhance your nighttime experience, which make this portable fan for travel to be a great choice for camping and other outdoor activities at night.

Portable Fan fit for Backpack Size: The overall size of the portable fan is small enough to easily fit into your backpack for easy carrying and storage, without extra burden. The rotatable and foldable hook design of the portable fan at the bottom make it easy to hang on your tent, tree branches or simply placed on desks at home or in the office.

Multi-functional Design: The air outlet angle of the camping fan can be manually rotated by 270°, which allows you to get quiet and strong airflow from different directions, keeping the tent cool and ventilated. Just easily pouring the aromatherapy oil into the aromatherapy cotton pad, the upgraded aromatherapy function will make your sleep more restful and peaceful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for camping!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking to upgrade my camping fan. I wanted something that was sturdy, compact, easy to use, and rechargeable. This fan fits the bill! I love that it has extra features that are a bonus such as the light and charging station. I’m very happy with this purchase and would recommend it to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very well.
reviews.reviewText: Can't tell y'all about battery life yet,'cause it hasn't run enough to run out of power. Charged it up when it got here and it had a good charge in it from the factory so we'll see how well it works.It's light and blows good air so I would expect it to do as advertised. As it gets used, I'll update the review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small, but enough air, and battery last good...
reviews.reviewText: Is a good fan, and for the price I am glad is performing great for now. On battery I am using it at 50% of speed is the weather is not too hot and even is like 5 feets away the air is strong enough. At that speed lasts more than 7 hours, not sure how much at 100%. I use the light, is a useful thing... it has make my time better after a power outage at night. I can stay fresh and use that light, and even charge a phone if I need to. The charging port is type C, if you have a battery backup you can prolong the Fan usage even more easily if the power outage takes to long to resolve. Is a light weight, for sure a nice thing for someone that makes camping and carries to much things, this one is light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's a decent little fan. Sturdy construction. Decent battery life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This fan is great! It is quiet, works well. You can actually feel the air, and I like that it has 4 settings. It is stable on the base, holds positions well. The hook to hang it by was a smart bonus. Easy to charge and holds a charge well . Took it camping- it was so miserably hot at night and this was perfect and quiet. The light on it is also nice with 3 different settings.Haven’t had it for very long, but it has held up to lots of kid handling and walking. I’m so happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than I expected!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great little fan. I keep it in my car. It’s great for times when I have to wait in the car on a hot day. It has a light and several speeds. It’s easily charged and has ports that you use to charge your phone. It is light weight but sturdy. It’s an inexpensive and handy way to stay cool in sumner when I out and about.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Muy buen producto
reviews.reviewText: Está bueno el producto y excelente calidad, solo que si lo vas a usar en calor extremo te recomiendo comprar uno más potente, este es perfecto y cumple con lo que dice en la descripción pero definitivamente te es bueno para el calor pero si es un calor muy intenso es mejor uno más potente, pero la marca de este está muy bueno

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This fan has been a hot-flash Godsend! I placed it on my nightstand and it has gotten me through some of the worst hot-flashes I've ever had. The 4 speeds is a nice touch, although the higher the speed, the louder the fan, which I would expect anyway. There is an internal light that glows through the housing and it's pretty bright. Not great for me, so I just cover it in self adhesive felt and that worked perfectly. Overall, I would definitely buy this again. What a lifesaver!
